import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useForm, Form } from '../../../src/hooks/useForm'; const initialFValues = { idKhach: 0, ho: '', ten: '', sdt: '', diaChi: '', email: '', soLuong: 0, thanhTien: 0, idCheckout: 0, idSanPham: 0, } const FormCheckout = (props) => { const { addOrEdit } = props; const validate = (fieldValues = values) => { let temp = { ...errors } if ('ho' in fieldValues) temp.ho = fieldValues.ho ? "" : "This field is required." setErrors({ ...temp }) if (fieldValues == values) return Object.values(temp).every(x => x == "") } const { values, setValues, errors, setErrors, handleInputChange, resetForm } = useForm(initialFValues, validate, true); const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() if (validate()) { const formData = new FormData() formData.append('id', values.id) formData.append('maLoai', values.maLoai) formData.append('tenLoai', values.tenLoai) formData.append('imageName', values.imageName) formData.append('anhDaiDien', values.anhDaiDien) formData.append('urlAnhDaiDien', values.urlAnhDaiDien) formData.append('idRoomInterface', values.idRoomInterface) addOrEdit(formData, resetForm); } } return (
Create an account (optional)
And save time on your next order!
); }; export default FormCheckout;
